DelegatedWork.Name: AccessReview.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read access reviews on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write access reviews on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write access reviews of groups and apps on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AdministrativeUnit.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AdministrativeUnit.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Analytics.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's activity statistics, such as how much time the user has spent on emails, in meetings, or in chat sessions.

DelegatedWork.Name: AppCatalog.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete apps in the app catalogs.

DelegatedWork.Name: Application.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Application.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Bookings.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Intended for read-only applications. Typical target user is the customer of a booking business.

DelegatedWork.Name: Bookings.ReadWrite.Appointments
DelegatedWork.Description: Intended for scheduling applications which need to manipulate appointments and customers. Cannot change fundamental information about the booking business, nor its services and staff members. Typical target user is the customer of a booking business.

DelegatedWork.Name: Bookings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Intended for management applications that manipulate existing businesses, their services and staff members. Cannot create, delete, or change the publishing status of a booking business. Typical target user is the support staff of an organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Bookings.Manage
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to have full access. Intended for a full management experience. Typical target user is the administrator of an organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Calendars.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read events in user calendars.

DelegatedWork.Name: Calendars.Read.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that the user can access, including delegate and shared calendars.

DelegatedWork.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.

DelegatedWork.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete events in all calendars the user has permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.

DelegatedWork.Name: ChannelMember.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Read the members of channels, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Add and remove members from channels, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

DelegatedWork.Name: Chat.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read your 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.Name: Chat.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read and send your 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.Name: Contacts.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read user contacts.

DelegatedWork.Name: Contacts.Read.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read contacts that the user has permissions to access, including the user's own and shared contacts.

DelegatedWork.Name: Contacts.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user contacts.

DelegatedWork.Name: Contacts.ReadWrite.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete contacts that the user has permissions to, including the user's own and shared contacts.

DelegatedWork.Name: Device.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read a user's list of devices on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Device.Command
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to launch another app or communicate with another app on a user's device on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Directory.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps. Note: Users may consent to applications that require this permission if the application is registered in their own organization's tenant.

DelegatedWork.Name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups. It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.

DelegatedWork.Name: Directory.AccessAsUser.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to have the same access to information in the directory as the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to have read and write access to Privileged Identity Management APIs for Azure AD.

DelegatedWork.Name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureResources
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to have read and write access to Privileged Identity Management APIs for Azure resources.

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAdministration.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read education app settings on behalf of the user.

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAdministration.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to manage education app settings on behalf of the user.

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAssignments.ReadBasic
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read assignments without grades on behalf of the user

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades on behalf of the user

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAssignments.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades on behalf of the user

DelegatedWork.Name: EduAssignments.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades on behalf of the user

DelegatedWork.Name: EduRoster.ReadBasic
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of the properties from the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and a limited subset of properties about users to be read on behalf of the user. Includes name, status, education role, email address and photo.

DelegatedWork.Name: EduRoster.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read on behalf of the user.

DelegatedWork.Name: EduRoster.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about users to be read and written on behalf of the user.

DelegatedWork.Name: EntitlementManagement.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to request access to and manage access packages and related entitlement management resources on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's files.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the signed-in user's files.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete all files the signed-in user can access.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.ReadWrite.AppFolder
DelegatedWork.Description: (Preview) Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete files in the application's folder.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.Read.Selected
DelegatedWork.Description: Limited support in Microsoft Graph; see Remarks  (Preview) Allows the app to read files that the user selects. The app has access for several hours after the user selects a file.

DelegatedWork.Name: Files.ReadWrite.Selected
DelegatedWork.Description: Limited support in Microsoft Graph; see Remarks  (Preview) Allows the app to read and write files that the user selects. The app has access for several hours after the user selects a file.

DelegatedWork.Name: Financials.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write financials data on behalf of the signed-in user

DelegatedWork.Name: Group.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to list groups, and to read their properties and all group memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access.

DelegatedWork.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on behalf of the signed-in user.  Also allows the app to read and write calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups the signed-in user can access. Additionally allows group owners to manage their groups and allows group members to update group content.

DelegatedWork.Name: GroupMember.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic group properties and read membership of all groups the signed-in user has access to.

DelegatedWork.Name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups the signed-in user has access to. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

DelegatedWork.Name: IdentityProvider.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read identity providers configured in your Azure AD or Azure AD B2C tenant on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: IdentityProvider.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read or write identity providers configured in your Azure AD or Azure AD B2C tenant on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: IdentityRiskEvent.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: IdentityRiskyUser.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read identity user risk information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity user risk information for all users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementApps.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device's owner.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

DelegatedWork.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read email in user mailboxes.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.ReadBasic
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read email in the signed-in user's mailbox, except for body, bodyPreview, uniqueBody, attachments, extensions, and any extended properties. Does not include permissions to search messages.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.Read.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read mail that the user can access, including the user's own and shared mail.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.ReadWrite.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail that the user has permission to access, including the user's own and shared mail. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.Send
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to send mail as users in the organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Mail.Send.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to send mail as the signed-in user, including sending on-behalf of others.

DelegatedWork.Name: MailboxSettings.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to the read user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedWork.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to directly send mail, but allows the app to create rules that can forward or redirect messages.

DelegatedWork.Name: Member.Read.Hidden
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.Create
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read OneNote notebooks that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notes.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
DelegatedWork.Description: Deprecated Do not use. No privileges are granted by this permission.

DelegatedWork.Name: Notifications.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
DelegatedWork.Description: Allow the app to deliver its notifications on behalf of signed-in users. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete the user's notification items for this app.

DelegatedWork.Name: OnlineMeetings.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read online meeting details on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: OnlineMeetings.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to create, read online meetings on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: OnPremisesPublishingProfiles.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Organization.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

DelegatedWork.Name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

DelegatedWork.Name: OrgContact.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on behalf of the signed-in user. These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

DelegatedWork.Name: People.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

DelegatedWork.Name: People.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype). Also allows the app to search the entire directory of the signed-in user's organization.

DelegatedWork.Name: Place.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) set up in Exchange Online for the tenant.

DelegatedWork.Name: Place.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write company places (conference rooms and room lists) set up in Exchange Online for the tenant.

DelegatedWork.Name: Policy.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguration
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.FeatureRollout
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's feature rollout policies on behalf of the signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

DelegatedWork.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Presence.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read presence information on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

DelegatedWork.Name: Presence.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read presence information of all users in the directory on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

DelegatedWork.Name: ProgramControl.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read programs on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write programs on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Reports.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on behalf of the signed-in user. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

DelegatedWork.Name: RoleManagement.Read.Directory
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

DelegatedWork.Name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

DelegatedWork.Name: ExternalItem.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read external data ingested via the Microsoft Search indexing API

DelegatedWork.Name: SecurityEvents.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security events on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security events on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: SecurityActions.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: ThreatIndicators.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete) on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: ThreatIndicators.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security actions on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Sites.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Sites.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Sites.Manage.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to manage and create lists, documents, and list items in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Sites.FullControl.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to have full control to SharePoint sites in all site collections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Tasks.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read user tasks.

DelegatedWork.Name: Tasks.Read.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read tasks a user has permissions to access, including their own and shared tasks.

DelegatedWork.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete tasks and containers (and tasks in them) that are assigned to or shared with the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite.Shared
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete tasks a user has permissions to, including their own and shared tasks.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsActivity.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's teamwork activity feed.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsActivity.Send
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create new activities in the user's teamwork activity feed, and send new activities to other users' activity feed, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsApp.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user, and in all teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsApp.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user and also for teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamMember.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Read the members of teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Add and remove members from teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsTab.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for the signed-in user, and in all teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps, on behalf of the signed-in user and also for teams the user is a member of. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

DelegatedWork.Name: TeamsTab.Create
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedWork.Name: Agreement.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: Agreement.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AgreementAcceptance.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: AgreementAcceptance.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read terms of use acceptance statuses on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: ThreatAssessment.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new requests to assess threats received by your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's full profile. It also allows the app to update the signed-in user's profile information on their behalf.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.ReadBasic.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address, open extensions and photo. Also allows the app to read the full profile of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user. Also allows the app to create and delete users as well as reset user passwords on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.Invite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to invite guest users to your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.Name: User.Export.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to export an organizational user's data, when performed by a Company Administrator.

DelegatedWork.Name: UserActivity.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and report the signed-in user's activity in the app.

DelegatedWork.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

DelegatedWork.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

DelegatedWork.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write the signed-in user's authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like the signed-in user's passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the signed-in user's authentication methods.

DelegatedWork.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedWork.Description: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization that the signed-in user has access to. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Calendars.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read events in user calendars.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events in user calendars.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Contacts.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read user contacts.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Contacts.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user contacts.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Device.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read a user's list of devices on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Device.Command
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to launch another app or communicate with another app on a user's device on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Files.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's files.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Files.Read.All
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read all files the signed-in user can access.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Files.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete the signed-in user's files.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Files.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete all files the signed-in user can access.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Mail.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read email in user mailboxes.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Mail.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Mail.Send
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to send mail as users in the organization.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: MailboxSettings.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to the read user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to directly send mail, but allows the app to create rules that can forward or redirect messages.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Notes.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Notes.Create
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read the titles of OneNote notebooks and sections and to create new pages, notebooks, and sections on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Notes.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify OneNote notebooks on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: People.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Tasks.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read user tasks.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: Tasks.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete tasks and containers (and tasks in them) that are assigned to or shared with the signed-in user.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: User.Read
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: User.ReadWrite
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's full profile. It also allows the app to update the signed-in user's profile information on their behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.Name: UserActivity.ReadWrite.CreatedByApp
DelegatedPersonal.Description: Allows the app to read and report the signed-in user's activity in the app.

Application.Name: AccessReview.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read access reviews without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: AccessReview.ReadWrite.Membership
Application.Description: Allows the app to manage access reviews of groups and apps without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: AdministrativeUnit.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: AdministrativeUnit.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Application.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Application.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the calling app to create, and manage (read, update, update application secrets and delete) applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants or application assignments to users or groups.

Application.Name: Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
Application.Description: Allows the calling app to create other applications and service principals, and fully manage those applications and service principals (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any applications that it is not an owner of. Does not allow management of consent grants or application assignments to users or groups.

Application.Name: Calendars.Read
Application.Description: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Calls.Initiate.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Calls.InitiateGroupCall.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to place outbound calls to multiple users and add participants to meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Calls.JoinGroupCall.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your tenant.

Application.Name: Calls.JoinGroupCallasGuest.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user. The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your tenant.

Application.Name: Calls.AccessMedia.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: CallRecords.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read call records for all calls and online meetings without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ChannelMessage.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all channel messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ChannelMessage.Send
Application.Description: Allows an app to send channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user.

Application.Name: ChannelMessage.UpdatePolicyViolation.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

Application.Name: ChannelMember.Read.All
Application.Description: Read the members of all channels, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Add and remove members from all channels, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

Application.Name: Chat.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all 1:1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Chat.UpdatePolicyViolation.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1:1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

Application.Name: Contacts.Read
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Contacts.ReadWrite
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Device.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user. Does not allow device creation, device deletion, or update of device alternative security identifiers.

Application.Name: Directory.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user. Does not allow user or group deletion.

Application.Name: Domain.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write domains without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: EduAdministration.Read.All
Application.Description: Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on behalf of the user

Application.Name: EduAdministration.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps on behalf of the user

Application.Name: EduAssignments.ReadBasic.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read assignments without grades for all users

Application.Name: EduAssignments.ReadWriteBasic.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write assignments without grades for all users

Application.Name: EduAssignments.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read assignments and their grades for all users

Application.Name: EduAssignments.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write assignments and their grades for all users

Application.Name: EduRoster.ReadBasic.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read a limited subset of both the structure of schools and classes in an organization's roster and education-specific information about all users.

Application.Name: EduRoster.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read.

Application.Name: EduRoster.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read and written.

Application.Name: Files.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Files.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update, and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Group.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read memberships for all groups without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to read calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups.Note: Not all group APIs support access using app-only permissions. See [known issues](known-issues.md) for examples.

Application.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to create groups, read and update group memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write calendar, conversations, files, and other group content for all groups. All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.Note: Not all group APIs support access using app-only permissions. See [known issues](known-issues.md) for examples.

Application.Name: Group.Selected
Application.Description: Note: This permission is exposed in the Azure portal for a feature that is not  available for general use. Do not use this permission as it is subject to change.

Application.Name: GroupMember.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read memberships and basic group properties for all groups without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

Application.Name: Group.Create
Application.Description: Allows the calling app to create groups without a signed-in user. Does not allow read, update, or deletion of any groups.

Application.Name: IdentityRiskEvent.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read identity risk event information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: IdentityRiskyUser.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read identity user risk information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity user risk information for all users in your organization without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementApps.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device's owner.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

Application.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

Application.Name: Mail.Read
Application.Description: Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Mail.ReadBasic.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all users mailboxes except Body, BodyPreview, UniqueBody, Attachments, ExtendedProperties, and Extensions. Does not include permissions to search messages.

Application.Name: Mail.ReadWrite
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.Name: Mail.Send
Application.Description: Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: MailboxSettings.Read
Application.Description: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.Name: Member.Read.Hidden
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Notes.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Notes.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read, share, and modify all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: OnlineMeetings.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read VTC associated online meeting details in your organization without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: OnlineMeetings.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Deprecated. Do not use. Allows an app to create, read online meetings without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: OnPremisesPublishingProfiles.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.

Application.Name: Organization.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

Application.Name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

Application.Name: OrgContact.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts without a signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

Application.Name: People.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read a scored list of people relevant to the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking or your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype). Also allows the app to search the entire directory of the signed-in user's organization.

Application.Name: Place.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications.

Application.Name: Policy.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Policy.Read.ApplicationConfiguration
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all your organization's application configuration policies without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.FeatureRollout
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write feature rollout policies without a signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

Application.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.TrustFramework
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies without a signed in user.

Application.Name: ProgramControl.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read programs without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write programs without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Reports.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

Application.Name: RoleManagement.Read.Directory
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

Application.Name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

Application.Name: Schedule.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows an app to read and write schedule, schedule groups, shifts, and associated entities in shifts applications without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Schedule.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read schedule, schedule groups, shifts, and associated entities in shifts applications without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ExternalItem.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows an app to write external data into the indexing API.

Application.Name: SecurityEvents.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security events.

Application.Name: SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security events. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.

Application.Name: SecurityActions.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's security actions.

Application.Name: SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read or create security actions, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: ThreatIndicators.ReadWrite.OwnedBy
Application.Description: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any threat indicators it does not own.

Application.Name: ThreatIndicators.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Sites.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Sites.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.Name: Sites.Manage.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to manage and create lists, documents, and list items in all site collections without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: Sites.FullControl.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to have full control to SharePoint sites in all site collections without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: TeamsActivity.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: TeamsActivity.Send
Application.Description: Allows the app to send new activities to any users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: TeamsApp.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.Name: TeamsApp.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read or write application-specific settings.

Application.Name: TeamMember.Read.All
Application.Description: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

Application.Name: TeamsTab.Read.All
Application.Description: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.Name: TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.Name: TeamsTab.Create
Application.Description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.Name: ThreatAssessment.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: User.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, group membership, reports and managers of other users in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: User.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, group membership, reports and managers of other users in your organization, without a signed-in user.  Also allows the app to create and delete non-administrative users. Does not allow reset of user passwords.

Application.Name: User.Invite.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to invite guest users to your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: User.Export.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to export organizational users' data, without a signed-in user.

Application.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All
Application.Description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

Application.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All
Application.Description: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user. Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.
